item.title: Exploring Encryption and Potential Mechanisms for Authorized Government Access to Plaintext: Proceedings of a Workshop
item.description: Authors: National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine Published: June 2016 URL: https://www.nap.edu/read/23593/chapter/1 Abstract: Read chapter Front Matter: In June 2016 the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine convened the Workshop on Encryption and Mechanisms
